AboutMe.name: name
AboutMe.description1: Front-End Developer | React JS and Next JS | Javascript and Typescript. I'm a front-end developer with solid experience in React JS and Next JS.
AboutMe.description2: My skills include: mastery of React JS, with an emphasis on building reusable components and scalable architecture; proficiency in Next JS for developing highly performant web applications optimized for SEO; experience with Styled Components and Tailwind CSS for creating responsive interfaces; strong knowledge in Javascript and Typescript, ensuring clean, readable, and easily maintainable code; and experience in unit testing with Cypress, ensuring code quality and application robustness.
AboutMe.description3: In addition to actively contributing to the development of new features, I'm also involved in defining activities and maintaining existing projects. I have a proactive approach to problem-solving and am always seeking to learn and stay updated on the latest trends in web development.

Carousel.starWars: Frontend application to list and search for Star Wars planets using the SWAPI API, featuring planet listing and search functionalities, responsive design, and themes.
Carousel.githubBlog: React JS application developed with the goal of creating a personal blog, consuming the GitHub API to display posts as repository issues.
Carousel.todoList: React JS application developed to manage tasks, with features to add, complete, remove, and display completion progress.
Carousel.igniteTimer: Application developed with React JS featuring POMODORO functionalities to set a timer, interrupt it, and view the history of created cycles.
Carousel.coffeeDelivery: React JS application to manage a coffee shop shopping cart, with product listing, item addition and removal, address form, and display of item total and purchase value.
Carousel.marvelProject: Frontend application to list and search for Marvel comics using the MARVEL API.
Carousel.helpet: Application developed and presented as a final project for the Computer Engineering course, with the goal of assisting in the fight for the adoption of animals in street situations.
